org.numenta.nupic.util

Interface Condition<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Condition.Adapter

    public interface Condition<T>
    Implemented to be used as arguments in other operations. see ArrayUtils.retainLogicalAnd(int[], Condition[]); ArrayUtils.retainLogicalAnd(double[], Condition[]).
